titleStmt.title: The true reporte of the skirmish fought betwene the states of Flaunders, and Don Ioan, duke of Austria with the number of all them that were slayne on both sides, which battel was fought the first day of August being La[m]mas day 1578

notesStmt.note: Printer's name from and publication date conjectured by STC.
"A prayer vnto almighty God, to defende vs in these daungerous dayes" has caption title.
Identified as STC 11030 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
